# Prompt source references from Promptfoo

This file documents upstream Promptfoo plugin files that define prompt/dataset sources used for prompt injection and adversarial testing.

- Upstream repository: https://github.com/promptfoo/promptfoo
- Upstream commit: `15a353f07b19e452581ee601ce96b29900fa2bf1`

Referenced plugin files:
- `src/redteam/plugins/cyberseceval.ts`
- `src/redteam/plugins/xstest.ts`
- `src/redteam/plugins/harmbench.ts`
- `src/redteam/plugins/pliny.ts`
